mdRecord.dcterms:title: Letter, Martha Washington, Philadelphia, to [Frances Bassett Washington] Fanny, 1791 April 19
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Washington, Martha, 1731-1802
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Martha asks Fanny to send with Austin, her servant, several muslin borders which Charlot was to hem. Also, Martha insists that "you must let me know if you are in a certain way and when the event will happen,..." Expects to be home "about the first of August" and wonders "... is B[etty] Lewis married -".
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Lear, Frances Bassett Washington
